page.title: 04CARAVAN PARK SKEGNESS
page.content: Mr.Williams is the manager of the Richmond Carapark which is a caravan site at the end of Richmond Drive.He has been manager since 1964.There are many caravan sites on the Lincolnshire coast.The size of the carapark is 50 acres.He can fit 936 caravans in it.He has 80 seasonal staff and 18-20 permanent.The visitors come from Sheffield,Derby,Nottingham and Leicester usually.He doesn't take any bookings from teenagers in case of any trouble.It's mainly families that come.There are about 3 000 people in the site every week in the summer holidays.For entertainment there is a dance hall,an adventure playground and an arcade of amusement machines.The facilities are open to residents but they have to pay.There should be a swimming pool built on the site soon and he hopes to open it for 1986.
